alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Crockett County through 915 PM CDT... At 818 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 290, or 18 miles east of Iraan, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highways 190, 137, and 163 in northern Crockett County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
